Prepare for a clearer tomorrow.
Hero.testimonial: "The only pillow that actually stopped my neck pain."
Hero.bgText: DEEP SLEEP · RESTORE · DREAM · DEEP SLEEP · RESTORE · DREAM ·

alignment.subtitle: The Science of Alignment
alignment.description: Misalignment compresses nerves and restricts blood flow. Our ergonomic contours maintain the natural C-curve of your spine, ensuring zero-gravity support.

darkness.subtitle: The Science of Darkness
darkness.description: Light pollution triggers micro-arousals that fragment your REM cycles. Our 100% blackout engineering signals your pineal gland to produce melatonin instantly.

silence.subtitle: The Science of Silence
silence.description: Your brain processes sound even while asleep. We dampen ambient noise by 28dB, smoothing the sonic landscape to prevent cortisol spikes during the night.

ProductShowcase.title:
The

Trinity

of Sleep.
ProductShowcase.subtitle: Three essentials designed to conquer the three enemies of rest: Noise, Light, and Discomfort.

calmicloud.name: CalmiCloud Earplugs
calmicloud.tagline: Moldable silence for a chaotic world.

SleepAcademy.label: The Sleep Academy
SleepAcademy.title:
Rituals for

Restoration.
SleepAcademy.description: Great sleep isn't just about what you buy. It's about what you do. Adopt these simple evidence-based habits to elevate your night.

digital.title: The Digital Sunset
digital.desc: Blue light suppresses melatonin. 60 minutes before bed, switch to 'Night Shift' mode or, better yet, total darkness.
digital.action: Pair with LumiCloud for 100% optical isolation.

caffeine.title: The Caffeine Cutoff
caffeine.desc: Caffeine has a half-life of 5-6 hours. Your last cup should be at 2 PM to ensure your adenosine receptors are ready for sleep.
caffeine.action: If you're sensitive, CalmiCloud helps block the 'noise' of a racing heart.

breath.title: The 4-7-8 Breath
breath.desc: Inhale for 4, hold for 7, exhale for 8. This signals your parasympathetic nervous system to downregulate cortisol.
breath.action: CerviCloud opens your airways for deeper, unobstructed breathing.

Footer.description: Premium sleep essentials for a clearer tomorrow.

AboutPage.metaDescription: We believe rest is the foundation of a clearer tomorrow. Learn how we bridge the gap between ergonomic science and cloud-like comfort.
AboutPage.label: Our Philosophy
AboutPage.title:
Rest is not a Luxury.

It's a Foundation.
AboutPage.intro: We believe that a clearer tomorrow starts with the night before. Sheepie was born to bridge the gap between ergonomic science and the gentle comfort you crave.
AboutPage.p1: We spent months obsessed with density, rebound rates, and fabric breathability. Whether you need the cervical precision of the <strong1>CerviCloud Pillow</strong1>, the silence of our <strong2>CalmiCloud</strong2> earplugs, or the total darkness of the <strong3>LumiCloud Eye Mask</strong3>, every curve is intentional.
AboutPage.p2: We don't just sell sleep products. We sell the feeling of waking up ready.

ProductsPage.metaDescription: Explore the triad of sleep essentials: CerviCloud Pillow, LumiCloud Mask, and CalmiCloud Earplugs. Crafted for silence, darkness, and alignment.

ContactPage.marketplaceDesc: For the fastest support regarding shipping or returns on Shopee/Tokopedia, please use the chat feature directly on the marketplace app.

reusable.q: Are they reusable? How do I clean them?
reusable.a: Yes, CalmiCloud is designed for repeated use. Simply wash gently with mild soap and warm water, let them air-dry completely, and store in the provided clean case. With proper care, they outlast disposable foam plugs significantly.

sizes.q: Do they come in different sizes?
sizes.a: CalmiCloud features a universal moldable design. Instead of forcing a specific size into your ear canal, you shape the silicone to seal your outer ear, providing a custom, pressure-free fit for any ear size.

alarm.q: Will I still hear my alarm clock?
alarm.a: Yes. CalmiCloud is engineered to reduce background noise (like snoring or traffic) by approximately 28dB. Important alert sounds, such as alarms or phone ringtones, remain audible for your safety.

eyelashes.q: Does it press on my eyelashes or eyelids?
eyelashes.a: Not at all. The mask features deep 3D contoured eye cavities that allow you to blink freely. It provides total blackout isolation without any pressure on your eyes.

strap.a: Yes. We use a smooth, snag-free adjustable strap designed specifically to prevent tangling, unlike the rough elastic bands found on standard masks.

washable.a: We recommend hand washing to maximize the lifespan of the memory foam. If you must use a machine, place the mask in a laundry bag and use a delicate cycle with cold water.

firmness.q: Is the pillow hard or soft?
firmness.a: CerviCloud utilizes medium-firm memory foam. It is engineered to be supportive enough to hold your cervical spine in neutral alignment, yet compliant enough to feel comfortable, never stiff.

adjustment.a: Yes, typically 7-14 nights. If you are switching from a traditional pillow, your neck muscles and spine may need time to relax into their correct natural alignment.

cover.a: Yes. The cooling bamboo outer cover is removable and machine washable. Please do not wash the inner memory foam core.

returns.a: We accept returns or exchanges for manufacturing defects or incorrect items received. Due to strict hygiene standards, we cannot accept returns on used sleep products unless they are defective.

duration.a: Orders are typically processed within 24 hours. Standard delivery takes 2–5 working days, depending on your location.

cervicloud.name: CerviCloud Pillow
cervicloud.description: Transform your rest with the CerviCloud Pillow. Its 4D Butterfly shape cradles your neck to maintain natural cervical alignment, relieving persistent pressure points. Infused with thermal diffusion particles and wrapped in Ice-Silk fabric, it offers expansive, cooling support that adapts to your every move.

lumicloud.name: LumiCloud Eye Mask
lumicloud.description: Engineered for the heat, crafted for the soul. LumiCloud combines premium Soft Cotton Fabric with 3D contoured eye cavities to deliver 100% blackout isolation without pressure. Breathable, adjustable, and featherlight—it's not just a mask, it's a signal to your brain that it's time to rest.

calmicloud.name: CalmiCloud Earplugs
calmicloud.tagline: Moldable silence for a chaotic world.
calmicloud.description: Achieve profound silence without the invasive pressure. CalmiCloud is crafted from medical-grade, moldable silicone that seals your outer ear canal perfectly. Water-resistant and reusable, it blocks out snoring, traffic, and distraction—whether you're sleeping, swimming, or seeking deep focus.
